mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Tour Guide, 1984", "Care of New Dancers", "Public Opinion Poll", "The Spirit in a Square", "A Salute to Ralph Page", "Record Talk", "Clogging Terminology", "Refreshment Time" and "33rd National Convention." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "Mostly Modular", "Advanced Dancing", "Contra Corner", "Experimental Notes", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "The Callers Notebook", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On The Record", "Current Releases" and "Date Book."
